mapper.insert: insert into mapt values( mapt_map_idx.nextval, #{map_title}, #{member_idx}, #{people_num}, #{trip_type}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, sysdate, #{share_ok}, #{del_ok} )
mapper.select: select member_idx from mapt where map_idx=#{map_idx}
mapper.update: update mapt set map_title=#{map_title}, people_num=#{people_num}, trip_type=#{trip_type}, startdate=#{startdate}, enddate=#{enddate}, share_ok=#{share_ok}, del_ok=#{del_ok} where map_idx=#{map_idx}
update mapt set startdate=#{startdate}, enddate=#{enddate} where map_idx=#{map_idx}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from mapt order by map_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end} order by registdate desc
